column5: Hey guys.  I am heading up to scugog tomorrow and my buddy backed out, something about his wife being sick .  Anyways, I would rather fish with company rather than alone.  Any takers out there?  Fishing for bass going to try to be on the water for 8 or earlier. I'm leaving from Orangeville so if you are on the way I would be more than happy to do a pick up.
I saw your dogfish post somewhere. I caught one too....ugly as hell. My buddy ate it or atleast tried too.  yuck!!!!
to bad i am just reading this now. I would of been down to go, I live in port perry and no the lake pretty well. maybe next time - Alex
so how did you make out?

It was a little slow in the morn!  We fished lilly pads with frogs, had a few misses but nothing boated.  Then we tried to fish senkos for a bit as well.  Got a few smaller bass.  Then I switched to my little known secret weapon the chatter bait.  Had a few little ones hook up.  Lost a monster that hit, jumped, then came straight at me like a frieght train!  Good times, good compan    Thanks GoneFishin!  We will do it againg soon!  Oh ya I blame it on the earthquake
